Back in the tub, Mary began to wash her hair, but her calm was short-lived. As she worked the shampoo into a lather, she saw a spider crawling up the wall, its beady eyes seeming to stare right at her. Mary got scared, her heart racing as she froze in terror.

Kelsie, oblivious to Mary's distress, couldn't wait to get home and ride her new bike up and down the street. She bounced with excitement as Tonya led her to the checkout line.

But when Tonya reached for her wallet, she realized she was ten dollars short. Kelsie's face fell as Tonya apologized, unsure of what to do. That's when the person behind them in line, a kind stranger, stepped forward and offered to pay the remaining balance.

Overcome with gratitude, Tonya cried tears of joy as she thanked the stranger. Kelsie squealed with delight, hugging her new bike tightly.

Back at home, Mary was still shaken by the spider encounter. In her panic, she leapt out of the tub, forgetting her modesty, and ran naked from the bathroom, leaving a trail of water behind her. It was a chaotic end to what had started as a peaceful afternoon.

outline: Joel was very stingy with his money.
Lola was planning to go to the beach with her husband.
And Joel always feared Joel would need to use it for an emergency.
Lola told Lola's relatives that Lola would go to the beach.
Joel never took vacations or bought things for Joel.
Lola's aunt told Lola that she would also come.
But Joel kept on saving money.
However, Lola and Max had a fight before the trip.
Joel felt regretful for never spending more after Joel retired.
Lola felt very bad that Lola couldn't realize Lola's plans.
responses:
Joel was a man notorious for his frugality. He pinched every penny, always fearing that an emergency would arise and he'd need his savings to bail him out. As a result, he never took vacations or indulged in luxury purchases, opting instead to hoard his money.

Meanwhile, Lola was excitedly planning a beach trip with her husband, Max. She couldn't wait to soak up the sun and enjoy some quality time with her loved one. She shared the news with her relatives, who were thrilled for her. In fact, her aunt was so enthusiastic that she decided to join them on their trip.

However, just as Lola and Max were about to embark on their adventure, they had a bitter fight. The trip was put on hold, and Lola was left feeling disappointed and frustrated. She couldn't believe that her plans had been derailed at the last minute.

Years went by, and Joel finally retired. As he looked back on his life, he felt a deep sense of regret. He realized that his extreme frugality had deprived him of precious experiences and memories. If only he had spent more and lived a little, he might have been happier.

Lola, too, couldn't help but think about what could have been. She had never gotten to realize her beach trip plans, and the disappointment still lingered. As she reflected on her life, she felt a pang of sadness, wondering what might have been if only she and Max had worked through their issues before the trip.

In the end, both Joel and Lola were left to ponder the what-ifs, their lives a testament to the importance of finding balance between saving for the future and living in the present.

outline: Becky wanted to impress her pals.
Tim woke up early one day.
Becky showed her pals her dad's prized collection of rocks.
Tim decided to eat cereal before work.
When Becky's pals begged, Becky let Becky's pals each keep a rock.
After taking a bite Tim realized it was stale.
The pals left, and Becky looked at the empty spaces in her dad's collection.
Tim decided Tim didn't care.
Becky walked along the road picking up rocks to fill the spaces.
Tim kept eating it after it soaked in the milk a bit.
responses:
Becky wanted to impress her pals, so she invited them over to show off her dad's prized collection of rocks. Tim, who lived next door, woke up early that day, feeling a bit peckish. He decided to eat a quick bowl of cereal before heading off to work.

Back at Becky's house, her pals oohed and ahhed over the sparkling rocks. Becky, eager to please, offered to let each of them choose a rock to keep. They begged and pleaded, and eventually, Becky relented.

Meanwhile, Tim took a bite of his cereal, only to realize it was stale. He thought about tossing it, but then decided he didn't care. He kept eating, hoping the milk would revive the flavor.

As Becky's pals left, each clutching their new rock, Becky looked around at the empty spaces in her dad's collection. She felt a pang of guilt and decided to take a walk along the road to see if she could find some new rocks to replace the ones she'd given away.

As she strolled, she picked up rocks of all shapes and sizes, carefully selecting ones that would fit perfectly into the empty spaces. Tim, still eating his cereal, watched her from his kitchen window, wondering what she was up to.

Becky returned home, rocks in hand, and carefully arranged them in her dad's collection. She stepped back, admiring her handiwork, feeling relieved that her secret was safe. And Tim, well, he kept eating his cereal, the staleness forgotten in the face of his morning routine.

outline: Cody had really nice skin until he was about 8 years old.
Sam loved to fish.
Shortly after Cody's 8th birthday Cody's skin began to itch.
Sam would go out onto the lake often.
As time went on Cody's skin began to peel and it would cause Cody pain.
One day Sam caught a huge fish!
Cody went to the Doctor who ordered tests which showed Cody had eczema.
Sam took Sam's eyes off it for one second and it flopped away!
Cody was then prescribed special lotions and now Cody's skin is better.
Sam wanted the fish so badly Sam dived in after it!
responses:
Cody was a carefree kid until his 8th birthday, when his smooth skin suddenly began to itch. At first, it was just a minor annoyance, but as time passed, the itching intensified, and his skin started to peel, causing him excruciating pain.

Meanwhile, Sam, a passionate angler, would often venture out onto the lake, rod in hand, searching for the perfect catch. One day, Sam's patience paid off, and he landed a massive fish! But in the brief moment Sam took his eyes off it, the fish flopped out of his hands and back into the water.

Devastated, Sam couldn't resist the urge to dive in after his prize catch. As Sam plunged into the lake, Cody was sitting in a doctor's office, undergoing tests to determine the cause of his skin woes. The diagnosis was eczema, and the doctor prescribed special lotions to soothe Cody's irritated skin.

With the new treatment, Cody's skin slowly began to heal, and the pain subsided. As Cody's skin returned to its former radiance, Sam resurfaced from the lake, fishless but wiser. Though Sam never caught that particular fish, Cody was grateful to have his healthy skin back, and both friends looked forward to many more adventures together.
